name: .KEXT File Extension
summary: Learn about .KEXT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Mac OS X extension that provides additional OS functionality for a device or program; commonly used for peripherial device drivers; typically found in the /​System/​Library/​Extensons/​ directory.

content: You should not manually move or delete KEXT files since it can cause a kernel panic and Mac OS X to freeze.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
